US now pushes UN to back 'immediate' Gaza ceasefire to free hostagesThe United States on Tuesday revised language in a draft United Nations Security Council resolution to back "an immediate ceasefire of roughly six-weeks in Gaza together with the release of all hostages," according to the text seen by Reuters. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 00:57:16 GMT AAPPITQFYZNRZKMIL4MCZB43WY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-now-pushes-un-back-immediate-gaza-ceasefire-free-hostages-2024-03-06/Michelle Nichols世界中东
ASEAN summit focus on maritime security, trade amid South China Sea tensionsAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Wednesday that maritime security, trade and clean energy will shape the country's future with the ASEAN bloc as Beijing looks to increase its presence in the contested South China Sea. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 00:23:46 GMT Z4RAKGZ74ROHVNG4FWGOEA5O34 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/asean-summit-focus-maritime-security-trade-amid-south-china-sea-tensions-2024-03-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
Peru's prime minister steps down after alleged audio leakPeruvian Prime Minister Alberto Otarola said on Tuesday he had tendered his resignation after an audio recording came out over the weekend purporting to be of the official attempting to improperly influence government contracts. Wed, 06 Mar 2024 00:02:34 GMT AKQZUYK3TFIEJOJ5G5266TERIY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/perus-president-boluarte-make-changes-cabinet-says-minister-2024-03-06/Reuters世界美洲
At least 126 activists killed in Latin America in 2023 -reportAt least 126 human rights and environmental defenders were murdered in Latin America in 2023, according to data from the Inter-American Court of Human Rights (IACHR) published on Tuesday, matching the previous year's figure. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 23:38:58 GMT 5KUVPAM7GJPJVFKH4RHSNR26ZY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/least-126-activists-killed-latin-america-2023-report-2024-03-05/Reuters世界美洲
Pacific Islands face challenges as growth slows, says World BankGrowth in Pacific Island economies slowed last year to 5.5%, with tourism and remittances from overseas workers recovering in some countries, while shocks from cyclones and drought hampered others, the World Bank said on Wednesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 23:23:08 GMT XDSD3AKNPRLIDBC6YBH3OPPHYU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pacific-islands-face-challenges-growth-slows-says-world-bank-2024-03-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's Xi Jinping summons 'new productive forces', but old questions lingerFacing its deepest economic challenges in years, China's leadership has tasked ministries and local governments with implementing a new mantra from President Xi Jinping: unleash "new productive forces". Tue, 05 Mar 2024 23:03:44 GMT H3HIFQF3M5JIVEGZOTAHD244BI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-xi-summons-new-productive-forces-old-questions-linger-economy-2024-03-05/James Pomfret, Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang世界中国
World Bank, Gates, UN pledge close to $600m to end cervical cancerGlobal health donors pledged nearly $600 million towards eliminating cervical cancer on Tuesday, at the first global forum dedicated to fighting the disease. Pro-Palestinian group sues Canada over military exports to IsraelPro-Palestinian and human rights advocates in Canada on Tuesday filed a lawsuit against the federal government to stop it from allowing companies to export military goods and technology to Israel. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:41:05 GMT QCKDTLPON5NKHK3NLWUJAWHWGU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/pro-palestinian-group-sues-canada-over-military-exports-israel-2024-03-05/Ismail Shakil世界美洲
Russian spy chief calls Macron's comments about NATO soldiers in Ukraine dangerousFrench President Emmanuel Macron's comments on possibly sending NATO soldiers to Ukraine are pushing the world to the brink of nuclear war, Russia's Foreign Intelligence Service (SVR) chief was quoted as saying on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:10:13 GMT JYFBKOIA4BPJREJFZKXWFA2DD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-spy-chief-calls-macrons-comments-about-nato-soldiers-ukraine-dangerous-2024-03-05/Reuters世界欧洲
Brazil's ex-military chiefs told police Bolsonaro discussed coup in 2022, sources sayThe former heads of Brazil's Army and Air Force have confirmed to federal police that ex-President Jair Bolsonaro discussed a draft decree to prevent the handover of power after the 2022 election, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:33:29 GMT LZ4PRFZXKBMZ7FM36H3AXMGVOA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-ex-military-chiefs-told-police-bolsonaro-discussed-coup-2022-sources-say-2024-03-05/Ricardo Brito世界美洲
Yemen's Houthis say they target two US warships in Red SeaYemen's Iran-aligned Houthis carried out a military operation in which they targeted two U.S. warship destroyers in the Red Sea, the group's military spokesman, Yahya Sarea, said in a televised speech on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:27:03 GMT ZPJAPROOT5KF3DPCAGSNE4CGUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthis-say-they-target-two-us-warships-red-sea-2024-03-05/Reuters世界中东
